name.baseName: Raw leather/wet blue leather/blank leather-finished leather ; Cattle/sheep/pig finished leather ; Chrome tanning/chrome retanning/chrome-non-chrome combination tanning ; All sizes; NESPS2
生皮/蓝湿革/坯革-成品革 ; 牛/羊/猪成品革 ; 牛/羊/猪生皮牛/羊/猪蓝湿革牛/羊/猪坯革 ; 铬鞣/铬复鞣/铬-非铬结合鞣制 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers: without closed collection facility (unorganized discharge)，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers: without closed collection facility (unorganized discharge)，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程涉及从生皮、湿青皮和坯革生产牛、羊、猪等家畜的成品革。该过程采用多种鞣制方法，包括铬鞣制、铬复鞣制和铬-非铬组合鞣制，适应所有规模的生产。此外，该过程使用多种末端管理技术来管理挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）污染，包括吸收加引流、光解、喷雾塔和吸附，以及在没有封闭收集设施存在时未组织排放的措施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,三级代码191.0文件，在完整版文件中第2729页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAbsorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management88，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸收+分流，其效率为88，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备运行时间（小时）/总生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisPhotolysis，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management88，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是光解，其效率为88，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备运行时间（小时）/总生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers: spray tower，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management73，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是其他：喷淋塔，其效率为73，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备运行时间（小时）/总生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers: adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是其他：吸附，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=活性炭用量（吨）/标准活性炭用量（吨）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为牛/羊/猪成品革，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers: without closed collection facility (unorganized discharge)，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是其他：无密闭收集设施（无组织排放），末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
